extendedInfo.description: Reflection  of  purity- Gautam BuddhaA journey from siddharth to Gautam Buddha was quite tough and incredible also. People believed that Buddha was an avatar of the god Vishnu. Gautam was prince and son of king Suddhodan still Gautam felt that material wealth was not life's ultimate goal, he felt birth, maturity, renunciation, search, awakening and liberation, teaching, death are the part of life. He discovered four noble truth: birth, aging, illness, death. Remaining life he travel world-wide and spread the message of peace, forgiveness and truth of life. In this busy schedule people need something different which make them lighten up, inspire them to do something creative, need a positive waves to balance their hectic life. People need kind of inspiration or spirituality to refresh their life. In this hasty life people find a little-bit time to make their mind peaceful and obtain positive energy and make their journey smooth. In this era most of people connected with social media sites and follows their ideal person and shared thoughts. Thatâs why, clarus apps exclusively develop an android application to their reliable users, so people get excellent thoughts, meditation quotes, refreshing quotes, motivating quotes of Gautam Buddha on daily bases ato make their morning very bright and motivate themselves and shared also such kind of thoughts with another people.so Download our exclusive Gautam buddhaâs  quotes application today, and give a BUZZ to your friends and family.Keywords: Inspiration thoughts, Free quotes, life quotes, Great Thoughts, Living quotes
